About Me

Hello! I'm Kostya Smirnov, 4 year student of KNTU. My drem/goal in life to works as a frontend developer. I like to create sites that are useful for people, combining the useful with the pleasant. At the university i study energy and non-traditional energy sources, such as solar panels and windmills, it’s already difficult to call them non-traditional, but this is the name of the specialty :)
This direction is not very interesting to me, so after the end of the 4th year, i want to get a higher education programmer.
I began to study programming at the physical and technical lyceum. There was a free C # course that really interested me, i learned how to create simple desktop applications and it was very cool. In computer science classes, we also learned the basics of HTML and CSS, but it wasn’t so interesting :)
While studying at the university, i also tried to develop mobile applications, but most of all I liked the development of sites.
